item.title: Home
item.content:encoded:
VERSATILE

OFFICES.

For Rent

Hourly Daily Weekly Monthly

Our modular spaces, ready whenever you are

Cre8ive is your blank canvas for limitless possibilities. Our flexible rental and set-up options allow you to transform your vision into a reality.

Booking Process

Decide which space is perfect for you!

Our various spaces give you plenty of room and options to make your booking as perfect as possible!

Browse our Set-ups and Amenities

Each space can be set up in any configuration you need! We also have a water dispenser available for all and projectors that can be rented.

Make your booking


Schedule your booking at your leisure, either via the booking engine or by contacting us!

Questions? Contact Us!

We are always on hand to answer any questions you might have and help you get exactly what you need!

Unlock your creativity, discover your focus

item.title: Location-old
item.content:encoded:
Located at the Intersection of Chelsea, Penn Station, nomad, and Hudson Yards, we are just steps away from, welleverything!

close to penn station, nj transit and the javits center!

134 west 29th street, new york ny 10001, Floor 2

item.title: FAQ-old
item.content:encoded:
frequently asked questions

  • Cre8ive NYC works to promote productivity and education in our spaces, so unfortunately we do not allow social events such as Birthday Parties, Dinners, etc in our space.

  • Castings are allowed on a case by case basis, however open castings are strictly forbidden. To avoid crowding the public spaces, we do require that castings rent an additional waiting room if people will be waiting.

  • They are all 3! We have versatile furniture and equipment set-ups, allowing our spaces to be set-up to accommodate a plethora of uses. Just ask when you book, and we will have the space set up for you!

  • Yes! We have discounts for students and non-profit groups, along with discounts for continuous bookings of 8+ hours and multi-space bookings. Please contact us for more information.

  • Absolutely! Please reach out to us for multiple day bookings and we will work out your perfect lay-out and keep it in place overnight for you.

  • Yes! We have staff on-site at all times during operating hours. You will be assisted from the moment you enter the lobby.

  • Yes! We can get you any equipment you need via Ventana Productions, just reach out to us to let us help you!

  • It depends on which space, and how you would like the room set-up! Without furniture, Studio type 1 rooms can fit 40 people, Studio type 2 rooms can fit 30 people, Studio type 3 rooms can fit 25 people, and Studio 4 can fit up to 60 people. Studio 3-4 can fit up to 15 people with its conference set-up. Please reach out to us to discuss your specific needs.

  • We clean every room each day and in between bookings. We have HEPA air purifiers in each studio.

Please contact us for any specific questions or requests!

Terms and Conditions

item.title: Book a Space-old
item.content:encoded:
book a space

For schedule optimization purposes, bookings of less than 3 hours in Studio Types 2 or 3 may be moved to another room of the same type.

Questions? Contact Us!

  • Studio 1-1

    Approximately 500 SF.

    Please include furniture and equipment request in your booking.

    Starting at $60/hr

    $65/hr after 6pm

    $530/day

    $2,900/week

    Contact us for multi-day bookings!

    Book Now

  • Space Type 2

    Approximately 340 SF.

    Please include furniture and equipment request in your booking.

    Starting at $44/hr

    $49/hr after 6pm

    $400/day

    $2,200/week

    Contact us for multi-day bookings!

  • Space Type 3

    Approximately 300 SF.

    Please include furniture and equipment request in your booking.

    $530/day

    $2,900/week

    Contact us for multi-day bookings!

    BOOK NOW

    Please include furniture and equipment request in your booking.

    Starting at $40/hr

    $360/day

    $2,000/week

    Contact us for multi-day bookings!

    Book Now

  • Studio 4

    Approximately 600 SF, with a sprung dance floor!

    Please include furniture and equipment request in your booking.

    Starting at $69/hr

    $74/hr after 6pm

    $615/day

    $3,400/week

    Contact us for multi-day bookings!

    Book Now
Terms and Conditions

Bookings of under 3 hours in Studio Types 2 and 3 (except in Studio 2-1 and Studio 3-4) may be moved to a different room of the same type. If a particular room is preferred, please make your booking within 24 hours of the event.

bookings must be at least 2 hours long

You can call    (646)513-3241
Or email    info@cre8ivenyc.com

Our hours are:

Sunday            9:00am - 7:30pm

For multiple studios/days, please contact us.

item.title: Spaces-old
item.content:encoded:
All of our spaces feature hardwood floors, acoustic insulation with sound dampening, 12+ foot ceilings, dedicated extra-wide hallways, and bright, versatile lighting. All spaces also have access to three restrooms (one ADA accessible), water dispenser with cold and sparkling water, and on-site staff that are ready to help whenever you need us. Studio types 1 and 2 have oversized windows that let in lots of natural light.

Our space can accommodate multi-room bookings and a plethora of different uses. We are on the 2nd floor of a doorman building, conveniently located just steps from Penn Station/NJ Transit, walking distance from all subway lines, along with several cafes and restaurants.

Space types:

  • Space 1-1 - Large Windowed Loft

  • Space 1-2 - Loft Theater

  • Space 2 - Windowed Loft

  • Space 2-1 - Recording Room

  • Space 3 - Interior Loft

  • Space 3-4 - Conference Room

  • Space 4 - Large Interior Loft

Space 1-1 - Large Windowed Loft

Airy and Bright Space

This space is a great blank canvas that can host

-Photo/video shoots

-Conferences/meetings

-Dance/improv rehearsals

-Fittings

-and more!

Space has oversized windows allowing for plenty of natural light and can accommodate up to 30 people

SPACE 1-2 - Loft theater

Theater space with a low stage, versatile lighting and a grand environment

This space can be used for

-Theater productions

-Improv performances

-Auditions

-Speaking events

-Stage rehearsals

-And more

Space can accommodate up to 30 people and is the perfect place for your next performance

SPACE TYPE 2

Multipurpose space with abundant natural light

This space can be used for

-Corporate meetings

-Product presentations

-Photo/video shoots

-Classes

-And more

Five lofts, each with approximately 340 sq ft of space, that can accommodate up to 25 people

SPACE 2-1 - Recording room

Quiet space with extra sound-dampening and natural light

This space can be used for

-Podcast recording

-Video conferencing

-Yoga/meditation classes

-And more

This space has extra sound-dampening, making it a great space for recordings and can accommodate up to 25 people

Space type 3

Multipurpose private space

This space can be used for

-Intimate meetings

-Interviews/auditions

-Dance classes

-Lectures

-And more

These interior spaces are private and cozy, with minimal distractions so that you can get down to business

Each studio can accommodate up to 20 people

SPACE 3-4 - conference room

Professional conference room

This space can be used for

-Video conferencing

-Product presentations

-Boardroom meetings

-Off-site meetings

-And more

Our permanent conference room contains mobile dry-erase boards and a wall-mounted flat-screen TV for presentations

STUDIO 4

700 sq ft dance studio with newly installed sprung-floor and a wall-to-wall mirror with draw curtains

Suitable for

-Dance classes

-Performances

-Runway practice

-Fittings

-and more!

item.title: Amenities-old
item.content:encoded:
Electricity provided by 100% renewable Wind Energy
Dedicated HEPA filter in each space and shared areas
Walls constructed with 2x framing, acoustic insulation, double layer sheetrock + Green Glue
Year-round HVAC
Vertical blinds and additional lighting options

Thoughtfully curated furniture and gear:

-Herman Miller

-Knoll

-Bose + JBL audio

-LG + Optoma video

-Quality photo/video rental gear and more from Ventana Productions (24+ hour notice required)

Amenities include

-High-speed Wi-Fi

-On-site staff available at all times

-Water dispenser with cold and sparkling water

-Coffee/tea package available upon request

FREE ON REQUEST

-Chairs

-Tables

-Dongles

-Speakers

-Racks

-Fitting room equipment

AVAILABLE TO RENT

-Projector + screen

-A/V gear

-Photo gear

-Seamless backdrop paper

-Storage

NOT LISTED HERE?

REACH OUT!

item.title: Terms and Conditions-old
item.content:encoded:
Terms and Conditions

If any problems arise during a Booking. Speak to the on-site staff so that any problems may be resolved

PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING POLICIES AND OBLIGATIONS CAREFULLY AND THOROUGHLY

  • Liability. Guest accepts full responsibility for their actions and those of their visitors and employees

    • Cre8ive is not responsible for items left in our Spaces or Common Areas

    • Guest is fully responsible for damage, loss, injury, legal liability, and other harm, along with any resulting costs caused by or to Tenants, Guests, and Visitors

  • Children must be accompanied by an adult at all times. Children (under the age of 16) must be accompanied by an adult (over the age of 18) at all times.

    • Children should refrain from running and making loud noises in Common Areas

    • Cre8ive reserves the right to require Guests to rent a space to use as a waiting room if children are disruptive in the Common Areas

  • Be respectful and courteous toward other Guests and the Space

    • Do not remove any property that does not belong to you

  • Please abide by the signage in the Common Areas: maintain a low sound level in Common Areas; clean up any trash; no eating on the benches, keep shoes off the furniture

  • Leave the Space as you found it. Be aware of and clean up any items that may be left behind, such as trash, clothing items, bags, electronic devices, water bottles, and food

    • Guest is responsible for any costs of intensive cleaning of the Space if required due to their Booking

  • Damage. Guest is responsible for any costs resulting from damage to the space, equipment, or articles stolen from the Space

    • Do not drag furniture, prop items against the mirror, or otherwise damage the Space

    • Guests are not allowed to secure anything to the walls, floors, or ceilings with screws, nails, tape, or adhesive

    • Cre8ive does not allow tap dancing, roller skating, and other activities that may damage the floors of the Space

  • Never store, transport, or possess hazardous materials in the Space

    • Cre8ive does not allow e-bikes or e-bike batteries to be kept/charged in our Spaces or Common Areas

    • Smoking, e-cigarettes, the use of candles, incense, or any other kind of open flame are not permitted in any part of Cre8ive

  • Cre8ive reserves the right to photograph/record activities in our Common Areas

  • Do not violate the privacy of other Guests. This includes entering bathrooms and Spaces that are being used by other Guests and photographing/recording other Guests without their consent

  • Castings and other similar Bookings are required to rent an additional Space if necessary to use as a waiting room, and cannot have Guests waiting/queuing in the Common Areas.

    • Cre8ive reserves the right to monitor the number of people waiting in Common Areas and request that Guests acquire a waiting room

    • If Guest does not lessen the number of people in the Common Areas, Cre8ive reserves the right to end the Booking immediately with no refund

    • Open castings are strictly forbidden at Cre8ive, Cre8ive reserves the right to end the Booking immediately with no refund if the Booking is for an open casting

  • Noise. Parties and similar events are not allowed in our Spaces

  • Alcoholic beverages and drugs are not allowed in any of our Spaces or Common Areas

  • Sound Levels. Spaces are sound-dampened (not sound-proofed), and thus sound can bleed into and out of Spaces

    • Doors are to be kept closed to reduce noise spillover

    • Cre8ive reserves the right to monitor sound levels and ask Guests to lower the sound if deemed too loud

    • If Guest is not compliant with the request to lower the sound, Cre8ive reserves the right to end a Booking immediately with no refund

  • Billing of Additional Charges. Additional charges that the Guest is responsible for that are incurred from add-ons (items, time, or space), intensive cleaning, or damages to the space will be charged directly to the payment method used for the booking

Booking and Cancellation Policy

  • Booking Policy

    • All Bookings and changes must be paid for before the Booking is confirmed

    • Guests must be 18 years or older to book a Space

    • Timing. Guests are allowed to enter the Space when their reserved time begins and must vacate the Space before the reserved time ends. To guarantee availability, if Guest requires time to set up or clean up, Guest must book the additional time in advance

      • Guest can request additional time in the Space, provided the Space is available. If a Guest believes they will require extra time, please give us as much advance notice as possible to accommodate the request. If the Space is available and not booked in advance, Guest will be charged for the time that they remain in the Space at 1.5x the normal rate

      • If the Space is not available for additional time and Guest does not vacate the Space before their reserved time ends, Guest will be removed from the Space and banned from continuing to book at Cre8ive. Guests future bookings will be cancelled

      • Guests will not be allowed to enter the Space until the Booking is paid for in full

    • All Booking Cancellations and Changes must be submitted through email at info@cre8ivenyc.com or by calling us at 646.513.3241

    • Bookings made on other Platforms will be Cancelled or Changed on said Platform

  • Cancellation Policy. Bookings can be cancelled for a Full Refund up to seven (7) days in advance, and for a 50% refund up to twenty-four (24) hours in advance

    • Bookings made under the Partial Deposit policy are subject to terms laid out on invoice

    • Bookings made on other Platforms may have a different Cancellation Policy

  • Changes to Bookings. Changes can only be made once

    • Bookings can only be changed if requested more than forty-eight (48) hours in advance of the originally booked time

    • Changes requested less than one (1) week in advance of the originally booked time will receive a 50% credit from the original Booking to be applied towards the changed Booking

    • Requests to change which Space a booking takes place in will be asked to pay the difference in price if there is one. We cannot refund the difference if Guest requests a downgrade less than two (2) weeks in advance of the Booking

item.title: Spaces
item.content:encoded:
Our Spaces

Our spaces feature hardwood floors, high ceilings, extra-wide hallways and bright, versatile lighting, creating a quiet and airy atmosphere. For additional comfort and focus, weve incorporated acoustic insulation with sound dampening, along with sound cancelling technology, into the spaces and halls. Our Space Types 1 and 2 are flooded with natural light thanks to oversized windows, and many spaces also feature mirrors, for dance classes, fittings, photo shoots, and more.

Enjoy convenient amenities like on-site staff, three restrooms (including ADA accessible), and filtered and sparkling water. Our flexible floor plan accommodates any event you might be having in our space, from intimate meetings to rehearsals to presentations.

Centrally located just steps from Penn Station, Moynihan, and several subway lines, along with a variety of dining options, Cre8ive is your perfect fit.

Explore Our Spaces!

Space 1-1 - Windowed Loft

25-30 Guests
Full Sunlight and Mirrors
Space 1-1 is a versatile 500 sq ft space, ideal for productive corporate events. Customize the layout to suit your specific needs, enjoy ample natural light, and benefit from a mirrored wall. This adaptable space is perfect for memorable meetings and workshops.
❮ ❯

Space 1-2

25-30 Guests
Low Stage
Street-View Windows
Space 1-2 is a versatile space featuring a low stage, perfect for presentations and performances. Enjoy natural light from oversized windows and benefit from adaptable lighting to create a dynamic atmosphere. The comfortable seating and sound-dampening materials ensure a memorable experience for your attendees.

❮ ❯

Space Type 2

20-25 Guests
Mirrors and Windows
Space Type 2 is a versatile 323 sq ft loft with oversized windows and a mirrored wall, perfect for a variety of activities. Accommodating up to 25 people, the space offers ample room for collaboration and productivity. With adaptable lighting, you can create the ideal atmosphere for your team.

❮ ❯

Space 2-1

20-25 Guests
Windows
Additional Sound Dampening
Space 2-1 is an adaptable 323 sq ft loft bathed in natural light. This space is ideal for productive collaborations, with ample room for up to 25 people. Our advanced sound-dampening technology ensures a quiet and focused environment, perfect for meetings, interviews, or recordings.

❮ ❯

Space Type 3

15-20 Guests
Wall Length Mirrors
Space Type 3 is a 323 sq ft loft, perfect for dance classes, creative projects, or small meet-ups. The mirrored wall adds a touch of elegance and can be used for various purposes. The studio's acoustic insulation ensures a quiet and focused environment, ideal for meetings, workshops, or creative projects.
❮ ❯

Space 3-4 - Conference Room

10-15 Guests
Conference Room

Space 3-4 is a dedicated conference room with a large table, whiteboard, and easy-to-connect TV screen. Ideal for productive meetings and presentations. This flexible space is perfect for brainstorming, collaborating, and sharing ideas with your team.


❮ ❯

Space 4

30-40 Guests
Sprung Dance Floor

Space 4 is our largest available space, spanning 600 sq ft, making it ideal for workshops, training sessions, or large meetings. The versatile room features a wall-to-wall mirror with retractable curtains, perfect for group activities or presentations.


❮ ❯

item.title: Amenities
item.content:encoded:
Amenities

Cre8ive is here to be the flexible solution that you need! We have on-site staff available at all times, hosted reception, and complimentary room set-up. Our facility has high speed Wi-Fi, filtered/sparkling water, and depending on the space, windows, mirrors, and a stage available for your use!

We have year-round HVAC, dedicated HEPA filters in all of our spaces and common areas, and plants in all of our shared spaces to promote a healthy working enviornment. We are ADA accessible, including having accessible elevators and bathroom.

The walls are constructed with double framing, acoustic insulation, double layer sheetrock and Green Glue for soundproofing.

Additional Solutions Include:

Paid Amenities

Projector

Coffee/Tea Package

Ring Light

Paper Backdrop

Backless Stools

Breakout Spaces

Waiting Rooms

Available On Request

Tables

Chairs

Whiteboard

Speaker

Rolling Racks and Hangars

A sampling of possible set-ups:

Hollow Square
Classroom
Conference
Workshop
U-Shape
If you have any additional requests, please reach out and we will happily accomodate you!

Not Here? Ask!

Contact Us

item.title: Location-new
item.content:encoded:
Location

Located at the intersection of Chelsea, Penn Station, Nomad, and Hudson Yards, we are just steps away from well everything!

Nearby Transit Details

1 at 28 St Station (3 minute walk)

1, 2, 3, A, C, E at 34 St-Penn Station (4 minute walk)

N, Q, R, Q, B, D, F, M at 34 St-Herald Sq (8 minute walk)

NJ Path at 33rd Street (5 minute walk)

Amtrak, Long Island Rail Road, NJ Transit at Penn Station (4 minute walk)

Cre8ive NYC

134 W 29th Street, New York NY 10001, 2nd Floor

 
Get Directions

item.title: FAQ
item.content:encoded:
Frequently Asked Questions

Cant find an answer to your question? Have a request? Contact Us!

  • They are all 3! We have versatile furniture and equipment set-ups, allowing our spaces to be set-up to accommodate a plethora of uses. Just ask when you book, and we will have the space set up for you!

  • Yes! We have discounts for students and non-profit groups, along with discounts for continuous bookings of 8+ hours and multi-space bookings. We also have discounts available for recurring bookings.

    Please contact us for more information.

  • We have a still/sparkling water dispenser available to all, along with our Coffee/Tea package add-on.

    Outside food and drinks are allowed, as long as they are non-alcoholic.

  • Street parking is commercial only from 7am-7pm on weekdays, and metered parking outside of those hours. On our block there is also an Icon Parking garage.

  • Bookings made on our website can be cancelled for a full refund up to 7 days in advance, and for a 50% refund up to 24 hours in advance via calling or emailing us.

    Changes can be made without a fee more than 1 week in advance, or subject to fee for up to 48 hours in advance.

    Additional information can be found in our Terms and Conditions.

  • Cre8ive NYC works to promote productivity and education in our spaces, so unfortunately we do not allow social events such as Birthday Parties, Dinners, etc in our space.

  • Castings are allowed on a case by case basis, however open castings are strictly forbidden. To avoid crowding the public spaces, we do require that castings rent an additional waiting room if people will be waiting.

  • Yes! We have staff on-site at all times during operating hours. You will be assisted from the moment you enter the lobby.

  • It depends on which space, and how you would like the room set-up! Without furniture, Studio type 1 rooms can fit 30 people, Studio type 2 rooms can fit 25 people, Studio type 3 rooms can fit 20 people, and Studio 4 can fit up to 40 people. Studio 3-4 can fit up to 15 people with its conference set-up. Please reach out to us to discuss your specific needs.

  • Yes! We can get you any equipment you need via Ventana Productions, just reach out to us to let us help you!

  • We clean every room each day and in between bookings. We have HEPA air purifiers in each studio.

  • Absolutely! Please reach out to us for multiple day bookings and we will work out your perfect lay-out and keep it in place overnight for you.

Our Terms and Conditions

  • Do not violate the privacy of other Guests. This includes entering bathrooms and Spaces that are being used by other Guests and photographing/recording other Guests without their consent

  • Castings and other similar Bookings are required to rent an additional Space if necessary to use as a waiting room, and cannot have Guests waiting/queuing in the Common Areas.

    • If Guest does not lessen the number of people in the Common Areas, Cre8ive reserves the right to end the Booking immediately with no refund

    • Doors are to be kept closed to reduce noise spillover

    • Cre8ive reserves the right to monitor sound levels and ask Guests to lower the sound if deemed too loud

  • Billing of Additional Charges. Additional charges that the Guest is responsible for that are incurred from add-ons (items, time, or space), intensive cleaning, or damages to the space will be charged directly to the payment method used for the booking

Booking and Cancellation Policy

  • Booking Policy

    • All Bookings and changes must be paid for before the Booking is confirmed

If a Guest believes they will require extra time, please give us as much advance notice as possible to accommodate the request. If the Space is available and not booked in advance, Guest will be charged for the time that they remain in the Space at 1.5x the normal rate

    • Bookings made under the Partial Deposit policy are subject to terms laid out on invoice

    • Bookings made on other Platforms may have a different Cancellation Policy

  • Changes to Bookings. Changes can only be made once

    • Bookings can only be changed if requested more than forty-eight (48) hours in advance of the originally booked time

    • Changes requested less than one (1) week in advance of the originally booked time will receive a 50% credit from the original Booking to be applied towards the changed Booking

    • Requests to change which Space a booking takes place in will be asked to pay the difference in price if there is one. We cannot refund the difference if Guest requests a downgrade less than two (2) weeks in advance of the Booking
